attributes.action: Adam Crozier,CEO of Royal Mail should donate his 26 per cent pay increase to Oxfam.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adam Crozier,CEO in the past year received a performance bonus of £469,000. His salary was £629,000 and he had £158,000 in pension and benefits.While Postal workers received a 2.9 per cent increase.
This increase in Adam Crozier's pay is taxpayers money that any morally minded person should rightly condemn.
Therefore I propose that he should donate all 26 per cent to a worthy cause in this case Oxfam.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
